region_description: Delphi is a historic site in central Greece that was once considered the center of the world in ancient mythology. Known for the Oracle of Delphi, this UNESCO World Heritage site features stunning natural landscapes and significant archaeological ruins. Visitors can explore the ancient sanctuary, the Temple of Apollo, and the fascinating Delphi Archaeological Museum.

places_to_visit.name: Oracle of Delphi
places_to_visit.description: The Oracle of Delphi was a priestess who provided guidance and prophecies in ancient Greece, making Delphi a significant spiritual center.

places_to_visit.name: Temple of Apollo
places_to_visit.description: The Temple of Apollo is the most important structure at Delphi, dedicated to the god Apollo. It housed the Oracle and is an architectural marvel.

places_to_visit.name: Delphi Archaeological Museum
places_to_visit.description: The museum features a rich collection of artifacts from the site, showcasing the history and culture of ancient Greece.

places_to_visit.name: Mount Parnassus
places_to_visit.description: Mount Parnassus offers breathtaking views of the surrounding landscapes and is a great spot for hiking and nature walks.

hotels.name: Amalia Hotel Delphi
hotels.description: A comfortable hotel with modern amenities and stunning views of the mountains.

hotels.name: Hotel Delphi Palace
hotels.description: This hotel offers cozy accommodations and is conveniently located near the archaeological site.

restaurants.description: Delfiki Taverna is known for its fresh ingredients and homemade dishes, providing a taste of local flavors.
